document_data.name: Huntsman's Call
document_data.mainbody: '''''Huntsman's call''''' was a spell unique to [[Maztica]]. The spell allowed a caster to summon game.
document_data.Effects: The spell summoned birds and mammals to the location of the caster. The spell had a very large area of effect, 1,000 yards (914 meters). While the spell summoned animals to the caster, the animals natural caution remained and would flee at the first sign of a threat or the sight of humanoids.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a whistle carved from the claw of a [[jaguar]].
